name: HongMeiling v0.49
desc:
WIP.~60% finished.

A physically based fighter that excels at close range.
Can dash and double-jump with 2 air options to change direciton quickly.
Currently has one air-only projectile attack with slight homing.
Todo:
more special moves
less debug hitboxes
fox timings on some moves might not sync up
Figure out how to do a fan of projectiles instead of a burst.
port every attackfrom soku(?)

Sprites downscaled from Touhou Hisoutensoku
